comments.body: That would be pretty good, I support the idea.

I would really enjoy this enchantment, because you can't block and attack at the same time, so this enchantment would level the playing field in pvp. Mob farming would also be made easier by this enchantment.
I think that's a good idea! Maybe an enchanment named ice spike's will come to! It will lanch who ever attack's you in the air!

I have a idea too. Lets coat the shields with sculk/wardens rib or etc. With coating it, it'll be more durable and its going to have a little special effect. If you attack with a sword or trident M1 you'll be knocked back, in my opinion 1,5 blocks are enough. another effect would be that it can tank 2 axe hits without getting stunned. I hope you guys would enjoy my ideas, Sorry for my misspells
Not happening son

Yeah, I think this could allow us to do wayyyy more with datapacks and command blocks. Unique armor sets, backpacks, cosmetics, there's so much we could do with it if they would just let us have this one thing.
this would make server resource packs so much better, imagine a cosmetic system with hats, shirts, pants, shoes, and hand items. currently all we can do is hats and hand items which is only 2.

It's a shame that after years this proposal has not received the success it deserved.
It would be an extraordinary novelty for all developers and would allow a truly remarkable amount of features in the servers.
That's dumb

I looked on feedback today because I had this great idea too. This should totally be implemented in the game. I think this would work like gold armor and piglins, if you wear gold armor the piglins are neutral unless proveked in some reason, but other mobs still attack if you are wearing gold armor. So if you were to wear a skeleton head, then skeletons would not attack you unless provoked, but other mobs still would. This way it would not be too overpowered, because if wearing one mob head would make you invisible to all mobs this would be WAY too overpowered but simply removing the threat of one mob type such as skeletons you would still be threatened by other mobs. This would also work kind of like wearing a pumpkin head so that endermen don't attack. Also, if more mob heads are added, hopefully, this would give more reason to try to get them. And while a ghast head drop seems strange it would be great to have the ability to walk through the nether waste and not be afraid of being attacked by those nasty creatures, maybe the head would also block out their awfull screechingðŸ˜£.

I too had this idea, there are many gameplay implications for this. In addition, more mob heads would make this feature overall more enjoyable

Implementation

 - This should only pertain to Vanilla In-game mob heads. (player heads that look like a Creeper head should not grant camouflage to the wearer around Creepers)

Camouflage

 - Allows players to walk freely around hostile mobs of that type without them attacking.

Exceptions

 - Wither and Ender dragon heads should not get this effect.

Additional effects

 - Wearing a Chicken head means Foxes will randomly attack you

 - Wearing a Sheep head means Wolves will attack you

I just had the same Idea. I like your argument of Skeletons not attack Creepers, but i think then moving hostile mobs would be way to easy and boring then. Though i do think that they still should defend themselfes if provoked.

I think mojang should add a feature, that if you wear a Vanilla-Mob-Head youÂ´ll be camouflaged to that specific Mob (like Endemans cant see you when wear a Pumkin). Maybe even you entchant it with some "camouflage to anthropots"- thing, that ALLWAYS (even with Trading) comes with "course of vanishing". That way hunnting Mobheads becomes almost like a profession and buildings Farms for that purpose would make sence lore-wise, while also moving that type of mob you still need to be carfull for the other types ob hostile mobs. And the specific Head would be "in danger" of being lost too :)

Crazy im all the way in 2026, i guess with this same old idea as you guys before me. Each mob shold most definitely be passive towards players wearing their mob type heads. But piglins could be different to where they get heavily offended if the player wears the head of their fallen ancestors, calling upon a piglin raid if even just one piggy that spots you with it on. Stick to gold fellas!! But if hostile mobs other than piglins are already attacking you, equipping their heads will do nothing because youâ€™ve then been spotted at that point. Wardenâ€™s wouldnâ€™t care regardless and still attack. Wither skeleton and wither boss could be a combo package for wither skeleton heads, mainly because the player would eventually have to defeat it anyways(unless they just love pure chaos). Hostile ender creatures will seise attack and respect you when player equips the ender dragon head with elytra wings. Futher attacks against ender mobs will cause them to attack again until the player find the time to manually place the dragon head back on. Getting creeper heads would save a lot of grief. Apply a nautilus shell to a zombie head to get its head or get it out of water at night and get next to a charger creeper. Skeleton heads can be changed to wither skeleton heads with a wither rose. Wither skeleton heads can be changed to skeleton heads with lighting strike and on rare occasions summon a wither army. Skeleton heads struck by lightning could summon a melee skeleton that moves faster.
If a helmet is equipped then mob heads cannot be obtained.
THAT SOUNDS LIKE FUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Lets try to be fair.
Slime boots will be weak and destroy as quickly as leather.
They can be enchantment tho with unbreaking mending, but not protection

The first one might work, but I don't think even tryhards could get that much netherite... 9+25+49+81 is 164 blocks, which is 1,476 ingots, which is 5,904 scraps and gold ingots EACH... Also yeah we need an achievement category
For the first one, great idea! For the second one, it would not work because I doubt even the best player would be able to make a level 2 pyramid, let alone a full pyramid.
Wadzee did it lol
hmm i think the hunger thing would be good to :) great idea
OMG I DO HOPE THAT THEY WILL CHANGE IT TO HUNGER I HATE LOSING DURABILITY

I hope they would just change it to nothing. I was thinking it wouldn't be that bad because thorns isn't too bad - it doesn't really deplete the armor that much. However, you're right, soul speed is hardly even useable. I've got a big field of nether wart and I've had to mend my boots 3 times so far grinding out growing and harvesting it.

And, I don't think it should be changed so that hunger is depleted because then - where's the enchant getting it's power from, you're food supply?

I would say since the character is running then change it so that hunger is depleted at the same level that it is for running but only if the character is running.
I donâ€™t think it should deplete hunger, I just think Mojang should slow down the durability decrease for boots with Soul Speed.
The new Spear's lunge uses hunger, Soul Speed needs to follow suit.
How would you go up a level unless triangulated and rounded blocks introduced into blocks
add planes cars
add furiture and ect.
I think I think they should make it so you can have golem spawn eggs.
I really think lances would be a great feature to the game. It would be the perfect counter to a trident.
This would in itself be a huge combat update, since fighting from horseback and with elytras would now be viable.
a horse back weapon would be neat. also enchant able horse armour as that is not a thing and it doesn't make sense why it isn't.
Should be more like a challenge advancement.
Hi
I like the name "Head Count" personally
Following

I agree! What happened that this is the one game that does not allow family share?  We play SoT, Forza when it works, Deep Rock Galactic, a couple others and expected to play MC Dungeons.  How do you think it goes down when one kid can play by himself in front of the other two and me?  I'm heavily invested in the XBOX ecosystem between hardware, subs and software I'm exactly the kind of customer that appreciated Family Share in the first place but this goes against the fantastic good will MS has built by catering to families.  On a side note my x1x hdmi went out 8 months out of warranty, $500 down the drain.  Many others reporting the same issue, this week has not been good for MS and I and to think I would buy 4 XSeriesX in the Fall now...

Just found out I can't use family share with this game. Had one of my kids had not already played over the grace period for returns. You can be sure I would be asking for a refund. Please update this game to fix this problem.
Please give me to settings the family settings

Voted! I think the food system is really boring, you usually only eat one item, and most foods don't have a purpose. I think that Mojang should add some system where you have to eat a variety of food.

After reading your feedback, i totally agree, it will be cool if mojang ameliorated the food system, they can do a mini upgrade of kitchen, adding more ingredients, they can add magical ones that will exist in the better caves, like sort of mushroom i dont know. it will be fun to add a receipe book

I was thinking the exact same thing, I also think that bigger, more complex foods (such as cake or pumpkin pie, could reduce the need for eating as a "full" status effect.) I also have ideas for foods such as "the fruit bowl": combine 4 of either pumpkin, apple, sweet berries, chorous fruit, and watermelon, with a bowl. ANOTHER BIG THING, every time I see one I wonder, why no egg recipes! (besides cake) I think we should have more recipes with eggs as well as being able to put an egg in a furnace or food cooker to eat. That is all, thank you.

I think they should mess around more with how long foods take to eat for greater variety and in order to encourage the player to have a more varied diet.

They could make it so that if after eating 16 of one food type it will fill up slightly less haunches so that after youâ€™ve eaten 96 of one food you will only get half the value as you did at the beginning. With some foods this process could be faster or slower because eating 32 pumpkin pies is more balanced than eating 32 pieces of plain bread.

Secondary affects would also be nice affecting: strength, haste, swim speed, jump length etc..

They should allow a cauldron to provide moisture to the 4 immediate blocks placed next to it t. Cold surfaces condensate moisture when Hot gasses touch it, like bathroom mirrors after a shower. They should provide just the minimum moisture for the immediate blocks. I can work with that. And you shouldnâ€™t be limited to what you can farmâ€¦ anything you can place on a farm block or next to water should grow (sugar cane, bamboo, potatoes, carrots, wheat, beats, etc.

I feel like horse armor needs to have durability like any other armor in the game, what I mean by that, is it seems more like a cosmetic item for our noble steeds rather than actual protection. Its behavior is inconsistent with player armor, which is a wasted opportunity.

I think it would be good if your suggestions for saddles and horse armor made it into the game.
Horse aren't very useful because of elytras, making durability on their equipments would only make them even more annoying.
I would like to add that, regardless of whether or not this is added, I think Water Bottles should stack up to 16, like Honey Bottles.
I think there should be a thirst when you go in the desert but this is a good idea to
This is a duplicate post (too similar to an existing one), you can post comments here: https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/360020295251-More-uses-for-splash-water-bottle

Maybe have it that the cobble production is replaced by basalt entirely, and have 4 basalt in a crafting table make 4 cobblestone. So you can still have cobble generators but be able to get basalt as well

oh, I would love this!
This is a good idea!

Looks like they used your idea! We have the respawn anchor now, which looks and crafts almost like you mentioned!
